text: Why is suicide the  cowards way out I typically follow posts on murders mysteries serial killers and mainly I find that when the perpetrator eventually kills himself in order to  avoid  punishment  the media labels him a coward for not facing the consequences    I ve never understood why they say that  sure I know that you do a crime you should face the punishment and killing yourself allows you to get away from it entirely  so some may look at him and say he got away with it by doing so But did he   He s killing himself  eliminating any chance of growth  change or discovery of his life  How is this different than rotting in jail the rest of your life I don t see it as the cowards way out  I don t see him as winning the situation  No one wins   I m by no means bashing anyone that is suicidal by the way    I m   years old and I ve been suicidal since I was about   and lately it s just been getting really close to rock bottom  I have a few friends and great family and they don t suspect a thing  I m the person that always tries to make people laugh and that s how I ve been hiding I all these years  Little do they know   I m addicted to pain pm pills and I take almost a bottle a night just to get away from everything so I don t have to feel  I know it won t kill me but I know it s effecting my health and slowly but surely my time will come   Thanks for listening  I m interested in hearing anyone s thoughts
